concept.title: LwDITA topic
concept.shortdesc: The LwDITA topic contains the fundamental structures that are necessary to author a unit of stand-alone information.

conbody.p: A LwDITA topic can contain the following structural elements:

dlentry.dd: A label that connotes the purpose of the content that is associated with it.
A brief depiction of the purpose or theme of a topic.
A container for metadata about a topic (for example, author information or subject category).
A container for the main content of a topic. It might include several sections.
An organizational division within a topic. It can have an optional title.

conbody.p: A LwDITA topic can be represented, with modifications to accommodate different authoring languages, in XDITA, HDITA, and MDITA.
